Text.val: Author : Juergen Paarmann
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
02.02.2009 SH SCR14356 Extended logic to remove/extract the leading country code
01.10.2008 SH SCR13994 Added CTRY_ZIPCODE_ADD handling
10.03.20078 SH SCR13459 Changed program logic to handle multiple % in picture
08.12.2006 SH SCR12157 Added task to remove multiple blanks inside the zip/city
string, only one blank is allowed as delimiter
//18-11-2005 JP SCR #9491 remove XML reserved charachters from city
//06-06-2005 JP SCR #8314 implement special NL zipcode reformating
//11-03-2005 JP SCR #7907 remove call to old BDH001
//10-12-2004 JP SCR #7209 implement additional rules for zip code extraction
//03-12-2004 JP SCR #7209 extend new extraction - see submitter note(17-11-2004)
//11-11-2004 JP SCR #7209 new extraction program due to extended CTRY rules
//JP SCR #9491 remove XML reserved charachters
-- Remove multiple intermediates blanks, only one blank is allowed as delimiter
(also leading / trailing blanks will be removed)
-- Update working strings
... do not remove leading country codes if equal to the zip code addition and
followed by a dash (this will be removed later in the program)
-- If PI.COUNTRY = 'NL' --> Removed the leading country code
(Special NL handling because the zipcode has to be reformatted)
... else if the country code without a dash as delimieter is delivered
inside the zip/city string it'll be removed
//zipcode extraction necessary
//extraction succeeded
//concatenate "before"
//concatenate "after"
//error in zipcode extraction
//no zipcode extraction
... if no '_' delimiter exists set to 20 to skip delimiter check
-- Normal scan with full picture mask
... first remove possible zipcode addtions, e.g. from D-52399 the
'D-' which determines the country code
-- If normal scan fails, try to extract the zipcode by using jokers (='%')
Only jokers left from a possible delimeter (='_') are supported
(LoopCounter = 6 to avoid endless loops in case of problems with the extracted
picture mask)
... restore city string, already changed by normal scan process
... first remove possible zipcode addtions
-- Extraction of zipcode is not possible, give error to users

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({0,20})<>'' AND (Len (Trim ({0,20}))=1 AND Upper (Trim ({0,20}))=Upper (Left (Trim ({0,9}),1)) AND MID (Trim ({0,9}),2,1)='-' OR Len (Trim ({0,20}))=2 AND Upper (Trim ({0,20}))=Upper (Left (Trim ({0,9}),2)) AND MID (Trim ({0,9}),3,1)='-')
InStr ({0,21},'%')>0 AND InStr ({0,21},'%')<{0,22} AND {0,6}='Y' OR LoopCounter ()=6

Text.val: -- This task also removes leading / trailing blanks from zip / city string
//extract one character
//check if there is an error in zipcode picture
